hamburgerAnimation.details: 3 bars (.top, .middle, .bottom), top rotates +45deg, bottom rotates -45deg, middle overlaps. Black (#000) bars, 20px x 3px.

accordionBehavior.notes: This site uses slide-in-panel pattern, NOT accordion. See slideInPanelBehavior for mobile menu behavior details.
